title: [HELP] Pvp.Net Crushing On Windows 8! Please Help Riot !
body:
Hello Eveyone, i really need your help...
i did reset on my pc and all my pc deleted, i tryed to install again LoL but when im launch the lol.launcher
Its load the logo, and after crush, and saying : ''PVP.net Patcher Kernel is not responding''.
I tryed all the ways, Run As administrator, all the ways, still not work ! ): i really want to play...

Please Someone help me, and riot PLease!
Thanks ^^

ThEReZoX,EUNE Player â™¥

replies.body: This error is usually due to a permissions issue with your OS that's preventing the patcher from launching.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings and get you in.  Hope that helps!

its still dont work !
Please check the Download file , or something else i can do! its not working at all !
